solution_line_template: Daria wants to buy tickets for {total_people} persons, so the cost will be {total_people} tickets * ${cost_per_ticket}/ticket = $<<{total_people}*{cost_per_ticket}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
Daria currently has ${money_daria_has}, so she needs ${total_cost} - ${money_daria_has} = $<<{total_cost}-{money_daria_has}={money_needed}>>{money_needed} more.
